bibl.title: Miscellanea Toponomastica.
bibl.note: I. Some Notes on Villages (1. Two Statuettes of Zeus and Hera in Search of a Home [P. Oxy. XII, 1449]; - 2. A 'Greek' Temple in an Oxyrhynchite Village?; - 3. Tauria, Tauron, Taurinou [P. Abinn. 79]; - 4. Aporikon: A Ghost Toponym [P. Erl. 101]; - 5. 'Thous Bouserapamonos'? [Pap. Flor. XVIII, 10]). - II. Four Papyrus Fragments with Village Names (1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 754. Account of Oxyrhynchite Villages. Oxyrhynchite nome, later sixth century; - 2. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 4168. Account of Heracleopolite Villages. Heracleopolite nome, first half of seventh century; - 3. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 3570. Account of Wine. Oxyrhynchite nome, sixth century?; - 4. P. Oxy. VI, 979 descr. Account of Oxyrhynchite Villages. Oxyrhynchite nome, late second or third century).
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Oxy. VI, 979 descr. P. Yale Inv. 754; 3570; 4168 145.4 P. Abinn. 79 P. Erl. 101 P. Oxy. XII, 1449 Pap. Flor. XVIII, 10

I. Some Notes on Villages (1. Two Statuettes of Zeus and Hera in Search of a Home [P. Oxy. XII, 1449]; - 2. A 'Greek' Temple in an Oxyrhynchite Village?; - 3. Tauria, Tauron, Taurinou [P. Abinn. 79]; - 4. Aporikon: A Ghost Toponym [P. Erl. 101]; - 5. 'Thous Bouserapamonos'? [Pap. Flor. XVIII, 10]). - II. Four Papyrus Fragments with Village Names (1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 754. Account of Oxyrhynchite Villages. Oxyrhynchite nome, later sixth century; - 2. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 4168. Account of Heracleopolite Villages. Heracleopolite nome, first half of seventh century; - 3. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 3570. Account of Wine. Oxyrhynchite nome, sixth century?; - 4. P. Oxy. VI, 979 descr. Account of Oxyrhynchite Villages. Oxyrhynchite nome, late second or third century).
